subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Markieff Morris scored 24 points and Marcus Morris added 17 as the top-seeded Jawhawks started quickly and put the Illini away with a second-half rush.
snippet: Markieff Morris scored 24 points and Marcus Morris added 17 as the top-seeded Jawhawks started quickly and put the Illini away with a second-half rush.
